snippet.title: CRIMINAL GIRLS: Invite Only - Official Trailer 1
snippet.description:
From the makers of Disgaea, and The Witch and the Hundred Knight, comes this exciting tale of sin, redemption, and love. 

Amazon: http://bit.ly/Criminals_on_Amazon
GameStop: http://bit.ly/Criminals_at_GameStop
NISA Online Store: http://bit.ly/Get_Criminal_Girls

Find out more: http://nisamerica.com/games/criminal_girls/ 

Seven delinquents, seven sins, and only one way out. Just hired for a new, mysterious job, you soon discover that this isn't your normal prison gig. You've been entrusted with the care of a crew of girls whose sins have damned their souls to Hell and an eternity of punishment... Their only hope of salvation is for you to recognize their unique histories, and to guide them along the path to redemption. Navigate through the four trials of the Redemption Program, and motivate your crew of delinquents to learn the skills to redeem themselves, or leave them to their fate.

Pre-order today: http://bit.ly/Get_Criminal_Girls
Find out more: http://nisamerica.com/games/criminal_girls/ 

Keep up with all of the latest information by following us on Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/NISAmericaInc) and on Twitter (@NISAmerica). Visit http://nisamerica.com/games/criminal_girls/ to learn more.
